title: Juan Manuel Correa: 'I thought I had lost my legs then and there'
description: Juan Manuel Correa opens up on the life-altering injuries suffered in the F2 crash which claimed the life of Anthoine Hubert last year, and his hopes of a comeback.
itunes:title: Juan Manuel Correa: 'I thought I had lost my legs then and there'
itunes:author: ESPN, Alexis Nunes, Laurence Edmondson, Nate Saunders
itunes:subtitle: Juan Manuel Correa opens up on the life-altering injuries suffered in the F2 crash which claimed the life of Anthoine Hubert last year, and his hopes of a comeback.
itunes:summary: Juan Manuel Correa opens up on the life-altering injuries suffered in the F2 crash which claimed the life of Anthoine Hubert last year, and his hopes of a comeback.
